com.andaman7.injector.webservice.REST

Class CustomRestTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.andaman7.injector.webservice.REST.CustomRestTemplate

  • public class CustomRestTemplate
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods to interact with a RESTful server.
    Author:
    Pierre-Yves Derbaix (pierreyves.derbaix@gmail.com)
    Copyright A7 Software (http://www.a7-software.com)
    Date: 19/01/2015.

      The API key.

      The login used for authentication.
      private java.lang.String password
